code: import React from'react';import{BarChart,Bar,XAxis,YAxis,Tooltip,ResponsiveContainer,Cell}from'recharts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const COLORS={normal:'#82ca9d',overloaded:'#ff4d4f'};const WorkloadDashboard=_ref=>{let{team,workload}=_ref;const data=team.map(member=>({name:member.name,capacity:member.capacity,workload:workload[member.name]||0,overloaded:(workload[member.name]||0)>member.capacity}));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Workload Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",height:300,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(BarChart,{data:data,margin:{top:20,right:30,left:20,bottom:5},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{dataKey:"workload",children:data.map((entry,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cell,{fill:entry.overloaded?COLORS.overloaded:COLORS.normal},`cell-${idx}`))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{dataKey:"capacity",fill:"#8884d8"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:data.map((entry,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{color:entry.overloaded?COLORS.overloaded:undefined},children:[entry.name,": ",entry.workload," / ",entry.capacity," hrs ",entry.overloaded?'⚠️ Overloaded':'']},idx))})]});};export default WorkloadDashboard;
